Simulate data alike the Melanoma data

Source: R/simMelanoma.R
simMelanoma.Rd

Simulate data alike the Melanoma data

Usage

simMelanoma(n)

Arguments

n

sample size

Value

data table of size n

Details

This is based on the functionality of library(lava).

Author

Thomas A. Gerds <tag@biostat.ku.dk>

Examples

set.seed(71)
simMelanoma(3)
#>          ulcer      epicel  sex      age  logthick     thick       time status
#> 1: not present     present Male 67.63431 -1.384208 0.2505222 3076.04823      0
#> 2:     present not present Male 57.92951  1.446500 4.2482183 2179.31190      1
#> 3:     present     present Male 60.48275  2.287579 9.8510608   25.85244      1
#>    ici
#> 1:   0
#> 2:   0
#> 3:   3
